subject: Re: [cc-community] Multinational Profit Day
body:
On Sunday 29 April 2007 06:18 am, David Berry wrote:> > Sony\u2019s YouTube competitor - CC licensed> >> > Sony has launched its YouTube competitor - eyeVio. By default,  > > uploads are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY)  > > license.

I have poked around and what I can't determine so far is do they give the option for BY-SA.
Does anyone know the answer to that?
all the best,
drew-- (da idea man)_______________________________________________cc-community mailing listcc-community@lists.ibiblio.orghttp://lists.ibiblio.org/mailman/listinfo/cc-community
